column5: Our place is located 20-30 minutes away from DFW airport, AT&T stadium, Rangers Ball Park and Dallas. We are also 15 minutes south of the Texas Motor Speedway, and 15 minutes north of Downtown Ft. Worth and the Stockyards. In other words, we are centrally located to nearly all of the popular places in the DFW area.   We offer a private room with a shared guest bathroom in our 3-bedroom home.
column8: Make this your home away from home! (1)
